channel.title: NewsFeed Releases
channel.description: This feed is used for a welcome message and if you keep it, will inform you of new releases.

item.title: Welcome to NewsFeed!
item.description:
If you are looking for feeds to subscribe to, some of the following sites may be helpful:

  • Technorati: Popular Blogs
  • Syndic8
  • Google Blog Search
  • Radio UserLand Top 100

item.title: Current version is v3.1
item.description: A new release of NewsFeed is available. Please consider visiting the NewsFeed homepage to learn more and to upgrade to the latest version.
